name: Punchette GMTK Jam
description:
Punchette is a difficult precision platformer with classic arcade style and a fast pace.

There was an issue with the Tutorial, fixed in the current version!

Music from OpenLight:

http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/451043

http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/449451

All other assets were created by Speed Radar Studio.
